languages.text: {n}Культистка обнажает зубы в оскале — зверином, безумном.{/n} "Я видела тех, кого ты зовешь слугами Его! Ни одна из тех душ не трепещет ежечасно от мысли о долге пред Ним! Пустые разговоры и бесплодные утехи — вот ради чего они гнут спины!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Культистка обнажает зубы в оскале — зверином, безумном, испуганном оскале.{/n} "Я видела тех, кого ты зовешь слугами Его! Ни одна из тех душ не трепещет ежечасно о мысли о долге пред Неумирающим! Пустые разговоры и бесплодные утехи — вот то, ради чего они гнут спины на службе, а не ради благословения Его!"

languages.text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"
languages.original_text: {n}Культистка обнажает зубы в оскале — зверином, безумном.{/n} "Я видела тех, кого ты зовешь слугами Его! Ни одна из тех душ не трепещет ежечасно от мысли о долге пред Ним! Пустые разговоры и бесплодные утехи — вот ради чего они гнут спины!"

traits.locale_text: {n}She bares her teeth — like a rabid, frightened beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talks and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

{n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

languages.text: {n}La asesina te enseña los dientes como una bestia rabiosa.{/n} «¡Ya he visto a esos que usted llama Sus siervos! ¡Ni uno solo de ellos pasa cada momento consciente estremecido por la idea de cumplir con su deber hacia Él! Todo son palabras vacías y placeres vulgares, ¡es lo único que les mueve!».
languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La asesina te enseña los dientes como una bestia rabiosa.{/n} «¡Ya he visto a esos que usted llama Sus siervos! ¡Ni uno solo de ellos pasa cada momento consciente estremecido por la idea de cumplir con su deber hacia Él! Todo son palabras vacías y placeres vulgares, ¡es lo único que les mueve!».

languages.text: {n}彼女は猛獣のように歯をむき出す。{/n}「私はあなたが主の従者と呼ぶ者たちを見てきた！誰一人として、目覚めている間、主への義務を思って身を震わせている者はいない！空虚な会話と卑しい楽しみ…彼らの苦悩はそれだけよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は猛獣のように歯をむき出す。{/n}「私はあなたが主の従者と呼ぶ者たちを見てきた！誰一人として、目覚めている間、主への義務を思って身を震わせている者はいない！空虚な会話と卑しい楽しみ…彼らの苦悩はそれだけよ！」

languages.text: {n}她露出牙齿，仿佛发狂的凶兽一般。{/n}“我亲眼见过你那些所谓的‘忠仆’！真正的忠仆时时刻刻都该思考对祂的职责，可他们之中根本没有人这么做！他们只会夸夸其谈，享受卑劣的愉悦！这才是他们辛苦劳作的唯一目的！”
languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

traits.locale_text: {n}她露出牙齿，仿佛发狂的凶兽一般。{/n}“我亲眼见过你那些所谓的‘忠仆’！真正的忠仆时时刻刻都该思考对祂的职责，可他们之中根本没有人这么做！他们只会夸夸其谈，享受卑劣的愉悦！这才是他们辛苦劳作的唯一目的！”

languages.text: {n}Sie fletscht die Zähne wie eine tollwütige Bestie.{/n} "Ich habe jene gesehen, die Ihr Seine Diener nennt! Keine dieser Seelen verbringt jede wache Stunde zitternd bei dem Gedanken an ihre Pflicht Ihm gegenüber! Leeres Geschwätz und simple Freuden – mehr streben sie nicht an!"
languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie fletscht die Zähne wie eine tollwütige Bestie.{/n} "Ich habe jene gesehen, die Ihr Seine Diener nennt! Keine dieser Seelen verbringt jede wache Stunde zitternd bei dem Gedanken an ihre Pflicht Ihm gegenüber! Leeres Geschwätz und simple Freuden – mehr streben sie nicht an!"

languages.text: {n}Elle montre les dents comme une bête enragée.{/n} « J'ai vu ceux que vous appelez Ses serviteurs ! Aucun d'entre eux ne passe chaque instant de sa vie à trembler à la pensée de son devoir envers Lui ! Vaines paroles et dépravation, voilà tout ce qui les intéresse ! »
languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle montre les dents comme une bête enragée.{/n} « J'ai vu ceux que vous appelez Ses serviteurs ! Aucun d'entre eux ne passe chaque instant de sa vie à trembler à la pensée de son devoir envers Lui ! Vaines paroles et dépravation, voilà tout ce qui les intéresse ! »

languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, kuduz hayvanlar gibi dişlerini gösteriyor.{/n} "O'nun hizmetkârı dediklerini görmedim sanma! İçlerinden biri bile tüm gün O'na vazifesini düşünüp tir tir titremiyor! Boş laflarla alçak zevkler... Bunların uğruna yaşıyorlar!"
languages.original_text: {n}She bares her teeth, like a rabid beast.{/n} "I've seen those you call His servants! Not one of those souls spends their every waking hour trembling at the thought of their duty to Him! Empty talk and base delights — that is all they toil for!"
